data.system_settings: Windows 7 Pro x64, latest Discord Canary, Android 5.1, Discord Alpha v3.2.8
data.actual_result: The Android device stays in connected to the voice channel (will not transmit voice though)
data.expected_result: The Android device should be kicked out of the voice channel
data.short_description: Joining a voice channel on Android keeps you in the channel after reconnecting on PC
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel on PC (Untested on iOS) - Connect to the same voice channel on an Android device - Reconnect on PC
